website_summaries.verdict: Casual mid-cut leather women's Sorel boot with sealed waterproof construction.
pros: A dressy boot ideal for casual wear
High degree of insulation, especially when worn with wool socks
cons: Best for fall weather and milder winter conditions

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! I bought them for a trip to Paris because it was going to be rainy when I was there and they did not disappoint. They were warm and waterproof, but most importantly, they were comfortable! I walked 24 miles in these shoes over three days with absolutely no issues. Now that I'm back from my trip, I wear them almost daily as causal boots with jeans. I love them! I would HIGHLY recommend these. Two years later. These are still amazing shoes. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Soooo comfortable. I have been looking for over a year for boots to wear to work that are stylish ( cute) and comfortable. I have bad feet from wearing ankle boots with a heel and standing all day. It caused nerve damage. I am supposed to wear orthodic shoes but couldn’t find any that didn’t look like old lady shoes (no offense to the elderly but I’m not there yet). These are perfect!! And I am tall and have big feet .. size 11 and these do not look like homie the clown shoes ❤️ If the price goes down I may order another pair in black 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cinderelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Size:9 Color: Elk These boots are amazing! Instantly comfortable, minimal breaking in, and ridiculously adorable. I’m usually a 9 and I ordered a 9 and they fit perfectly even with thick socks. They’re also very well made. I look forward to wearing these all fall/winter/spring.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cox

customer_reviews.title: Heel strap has broken on two separate pairs of boots.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these boots I have purchased (the first pair I bought from a different retailer, and subsequently returned). I wanted to give them a second shot because they are so cute. But on both pairs the heel strap has ripped off indicating that they are cheaply made. These boots are WAY too expensive to have a flaw like this. Apparently the return window has closed, otherwise I would be sending these back!
customer_reviews.author: Golivia

customer_reviews.title: Received Not New Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I received looked like they had been worn before. The back label was completely ripped and the liner was half destroyed. Lots of scruff marks everywhere. Very disappointed for such expensive shoes to not be brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I don't have wide feet, but these boots were seriously cutting off my circulation. I have since heard that Sorel changed the width of their boots this year (2019) to be more narrow. When I mentioned to a few friends that I had to send the boots back, 2 of them said the same thing happened to them as well. So I know it's not just me! Fix it Sorel! I really want these boots to work!!
customer_reviews.author: luvedmama

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof work boot
customer_reviews.text: + Highly effective waterproofness. + Does not make feet sweat or either uncomfortably hot or cold. Boots are lightweight but durable. - Fits tight at toes and lose around the ankle for me. Got some blisters in strange places the first several wears. Probably less comfortable than other Sorel boots hence only 4 stars. I wear these instead of Timberlands for work. I would not wear these in extreme cold weather and have been wearing them Spring through Fall.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Anne 🌼Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Unique Exterior Boot Design with Amazing Comfort and Durability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eye on these boots for quite a while now. I was happy to see that I was able to snag it for a decent price on amazon. There is one little defect for this boot though and it is not visible because it is inside of the boot. The interior lining for the right boot is torn on the anterior side of the bridge. It’s not too big of a problem for me though because aside from that, the exterior of the boot still looks great. I’ve ready many positive reviews for this boot and i’m Looking forward to getting these babies in the rain and/or snow.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Vue

customer_reviews.title: Hard shoe form
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes mainly because they were waterproof, ankle height and I thought I could use them to walk around when it was raining out. The size was ok but the top and whole shoe just seemed hard. Another reviewer mentioned that at the ankle these shoes cut in and I could see now how that could happen. They aren't a giving shoe as far as form goes so they were sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, comfy, sturdy, warm but not too warm. I LOVE these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a good five or six different pairs before settling on these. Sorel makes a really good product, and these boots are no exception. I've put them to the test while hiking; walking straight through puddles; in late spring temperatures; in a blizzard; on icy sidewalks and grates; and in mud. They NEVER fail. They're comfortable in all temperatures and they don't leak. The only detracting comment I can add is that they're a bit tight around the instep, so really heavy socks might not be the best choice, but they're also not necessary with these boots because they have amazing temperature control. I am completely sold on Sorel and on these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. My only issue is the lack of arch support so by the end of a long day of walking my feet are killing me. They have great traction and are definitely waterproof. I wore them as my travel shoes to Greece and were easy to get on and off in the airport, as well as stylish. They were perfect for trekking around sites and towns on rainy days. Once I replace the insoles I'm sure they will be a regular part of my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Christy W.

customer_reviews.title: Get your usual/smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 or 9.5; sometimes 10 in boots. I have sorel winter boots that are a 10 and still feel a bit narrow. Ordered these in a 9.5 and they were too big. 9 was perfect. they started a bit staff but are already breaking in. Leather is easily distressed/marked but that's part of the look. VERY comfortable and cute too. 9.5s looked too big on my feet (I am 5'7), 9s look good. Good toe box room although I wouldn't say they are wide (I have a wide toebox but wear normal width shoes). I usually buy comfort brands like clarks and naturalizer so was skeptical about these but they are great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra O.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I bought them to wear with my thick socks for a trip to Europe for the Christmas markets. They needed very little break in, and are very comfortable. I was able to walk in them all day, and they kept my feet relatively warm. I didn't do a lot of walking in snow, however, temperatures were very cold and raining to freezing at night.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Grey Boots go with EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these boots look! I had a favorite pair of boots I've had to retire after 15 years and finding something to replace them took a while. The treads on these are incredible, I love the color, and the fact that they are waterproof and I live in Minnesota and love to walk in the rain and the snow makes these a pair of keepers...
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect shoe- but wrong fit and color
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these boots to work so badly! The style and quality of them is great, but the fit is very narrow. I usually wear a 5.5-6, and went with a 6 since I knew I'd wear with socks. I can barely get these on with standard socks, and it doesn't help that the pull loop is quite tiny. These would not be simple pull-on boots for me. They do not offer wide fit, and a 7 would be much too long for me. In the product photos, the color I ordered, "Cattail" looks a lot more red than what I got. The material also is already a little scuffed just from packaging and shipping. Unfortunately returning.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie Gedig

customer_reviews.title: Durable Sole, Edible Body
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a great buy! They were worth every penny. I found the shoes to be durable, supportive, and comfortable. Although waterproof, they are not dog proof. Even though the rest of the shoe vanished, the sole went unscathed with no visible signs of wear and tear. Banjo is chewing on the sole as we speak and making no progress at destroying what remains. Highly recommended. Note: No animals were harmed in the consumption of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size (6.5) and they fit perfectly. Many other reviews stated to size up because the boot are narrow. I was nervous to order my normal size because I don’t have narrow feet, but size 7 is almost always too big. Glad I didn’t because these fit wonderfully! The boots are just as pictured and very comfortable. I’ve walked a lot in them and have had no issues with them rubbing my feet in anyway. Love the style and look of them. I‘ve received multiple compliments. Hands down best purchase of the season!
customer_reviews.author: B. Knupp

customer_reviews.title: Wide ankle opening
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots and I've been struggling over whether to keep them or not. I have a few pairs of Sorel boots and these are the quality I've come to expect. However, I have small ankles and the ankle opening on these boots is just too wide. It looks a little bit ridiculous, especially because I'm planning on wearing these with tights and a dress. I think I may have to return and exchange for the Sorel Lolla booties.
customer_reviews.author: abbythestabby

customer_reviews.title: Can you ever go wrong with Sorel?
customer_reviews.text: I like this boot so much. I have several Sorel boots and this is my favorite pair. I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of support. My other Sorel boots are pretty sloshy, so I expected my foot to move around a lot in this boot. However, these boots are pretty good - even with my narrow foot. On cold days I wear two pairs of socks to keep my feet warm. The only negative thing I have to say about the boots is that they look scuffed easily. Nothing permanent. I just constantly put leather wax on to even out the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy R

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These looks good enough, but I’m disappointed. For a 150 bucks, I expected better cushion inside. They are like any other pair of booties. Just a very slight cushion on the bottom and none on top. I also really feel like they are two different sizes. One of them just feels snugger than the other. Because of that, the seam on top of one bothers the top of my foot. For a 150, the company could have made the shoe with some cushion inside. When I add my own cushion it caused the back of my foot to rise out of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Fallen3

customer_reviews.title: Love! Fits well! Good for plantar fascitis!
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot! Fits well. It’s loose on my ankle but tighter in my mid-foot/arch area only. I have a high arch so shoes can feel tight despite a narrow foot. I have plantar fasciitis. Thus, I’m pretty picky on quality and support. I’ve worn the shoes all day several days. I work from 7 to 7 and then home to 4 small kids. My feet have done well w these shoes. Durability and quality seem good but I haven’t had them long enough to truly testify. But These shoes are some of my new favs. Would definitely buy again! Loved the color too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great bootie but runs really narrow
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. HOWEVER, They are narrower and smaller than expected (normally a 6 is borderline big and wide on me). I ordered a 6 and they fit nicely with regular socks. I considered sending back for a larger size at first, but they are loosening up and stretching as I break them in. I also live in a warmer climate, and do not really need heavy socks for warmth, just waterproofing for rain. If you have wider feet or need to wear thick socks, definitely size up or look for a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I was looking for a waterproof boot I could wear to work if it was snowing or raining. Unfortunately, the 7 was too small and the 7.5 was too big. The other issue is that the boot does not fit very close around the ankle so my ankles felt very unstable and also the boot just did not look great on me. I returned both pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight through instep—but overall a great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this boot runs a bit small (I even ordered up a half size to accommodate a sock) especially through the instep, possibly making this difficult for some to get them pulled on. (I did have to work at it myself!) But—once they’re on, they quickly warm up, making the material more flexible and yielding a nice fit. I definitely won’t be wearing lovely thick wool socks with these, but I still love the look and feel of them without.
customer_reviews.author: T. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Runs on the smaller side
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, I've been eyeing them for several months now. I noticed they're not available many places anymore so I had to get them before they were gone. I have owned one pair of Sorel boots a few years ago, so I should have remembered they didn't fit correctly on me. I usually wear a 9-9.5, I ordered a 9.5 and they were too tight in the toe area. I returned for a 10 and I love them. They were a few scuffs when they came out of the box like they've been tried on, but honestly I'm not picky enough to return them for that. Overall I'm happy, I love my Sorels!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: New go to boot
customer_reviews.text: My new go to boot brand. I wear boots all year, essentially all day every day. I was recently trying to replace a Cabela's brand that they discontinued. I was weary spending so much on a pair of boots but glad I did. I've put miles upon miles, hours upon hours, on these boots already. They're comfortable and have never gave me any sort of blister or chaffing problem on my legs. Definitely my new go to brand for boots. My only hope is they last in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: ekron

customer_reviews.title: Sorels Rule!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of Chelsea style boots that were not flimsy and had decent treads. Most women's boots are more decorative than functional. These Sorel Chelsea's are the bomb! Not only are they very nice looking, easy to get on, and nice leather but they have nice deep treads. I have worn them in a professional environment and on doing light farm work.Great support and fit. The only thing I could recommend a wide toe-base style for women that need a little more toe space. Great product and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M Bower

customer_reviews.title: Lovely basic staple pair of boots to wear for everyday in the winter
customer_reviews.text: These fit great. They’re a little heavy which, from what I’m told is to be expected from everyday winter boots. They’re cute and go with mostly everything and can be worn both casually or with office clothes. They’re a fabulous boot for Cleveland winters where snow is mostly plowed away. They’ve got good grip as well. The only issue I have is they look a bit scuffed and dirty after a couple wears but it’s nothing serious and you can always give them a quick wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boot for my wife because she doesn't know how to shop for quality shoes. She preferred a slip on boot, bought this based on her preference. The outer/bottom of the sole has deep tread and a very good grip to it when walking through rain/snow. She said it's very comfortable. I applied some shoe oil that I use on my leather shoes to the wooden heel. For the price of these shoes, they better last a long time ! But, it met the quality expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M.

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: first time trying them on, I used the loop to pull the boot on, the loop broke, so back they went. (apparently, it's meant for form, not function) I think I read that in another review, I guess I should have paid attention. My Lea wedges have a loop that I use all the time....so maybe these are not actually Sorels. It's a shame because they are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: True to size, nice looking, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color on this boot, goes with just about every outfit. Looks casual, but nice. Definitely waterproof and it has a good sole on it. I wear a true size 9, normal ankles and calves (I don’t order wide calf or anything) and I found the shoe comfortable in the size 9. If your foot is even a little bit wide though I don’t think this would fit. I can’t wear super thick socks with this shoe, but it’s perfect with just a regular Hanes sock.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!
customer_reviews.text: I have other Sorel boots that I really like. So I decided to try these. They are so narrow that I could barely walk in them. I very rarely return anything but these are going back. They are actually painful and I don’t have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I heard really good things about the Sorel brand. I bought these boots about a year ago and they’ve fallen apart. I don’t wear them a ton or walk a lot. The sides are coming detached from the sole and there’s a hole in the bottom of the rubber sole that lets in water. I spent extra money buying Sorel boots because I thought they would be a more durable shoe & last me longer but I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill cale

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with chronic swelling (especially when pregnant) which is why i need good boots. A reviewer had indicated that the elastic in the heel of these boots would stretch, and made them easy to get on despite not having a zipper, but I just did not find that to be the case. I could NOT get them on, even though I sized up. I'm so diapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. It took me a long time to decide if I wanted to send the money on these and I'm glad I did. They are perfect winter boots and have a really good tread which was one of my main concerns. I was able to wear them right out of the box with both thick and thin socks. Easy to take off and snug enough that they dont flop around when walking. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. They fit true to size and are SO comfortable. I do walk on the insides of my feet (pronate), so if I don't wear them with high socks they rub on the outsides of my ankles a little, however with socks I have no complaints. I took them out of the box and wore them the next day at work all day, and they also look amazing with any outfit :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: These boots are too good to be true!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with a pair of shoes! I bought these for cooler weather schlepping around in the rain and they are fabulous! The picture below is after an entire day in and out of my car in drenching conditions. I would buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Fritschie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect boots!
customer_reviews.text: If you are someone who wants a pair of boots that look amazing but are also practical and useful than these are the boots for you. I work on a farm and drive from the city to the farm everyday and these are the most perfect boots for that. I can dress them up with a cute dress or Hose them off cleaning up the chicken coop! Definitely a go to dual purpose boot and I highly recommend even over blundstones....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boot is cute, but too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Wish this came in a wide size. I had to return. A lot of people say go up a half a size but I don’t think that would fix the width problem. These are also extremely hard to pull on, and the opening sticks out too far in front making it easy for rain to fall directly into the boot from above. I gave it 4 stars cause it’s a cute, attractive boot and Sorel is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: kayce m rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a preschool and needed something durable that would stand-up to the harsh weather and the active small children. So far these are the answer. These stylish boots were comfortable our of the box. They kept my feet warm and dry even when I had to step in a puddle to get a lost ball. I would definitely repurchase this shoe in a different color and recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: These are cute!
customer_reviews.text: These boots run a little small, but still comfortable and I know they’ll work great for late fall and early spring in Alaska! They’re cute, and I love that I can wear them casually, but they also look nice and can be worn with a nicer outfit too.
customer_reviews.author: Hall

customer_reviews.title: Heel too wide
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot and based on previous reviews of this being a narrow shoe I had high expectations since I have a narrow foot. The toe box fit great but the heel was so wide my foot just slipped right out. Even heavy socks didn't fill it in so they will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: B Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The best teacher shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second pair of these boots. I teach second grade in the north west and wore these almost the whole year it was an investment but I didn’t buy other shoes because these were by far the most comfortable. In fact, I would change outfits because LOVED wearing these sooo much! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Tara  Keef

customer_reviews.title: Great all-purpose boot!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9, I normally wear 8.5-9 with fallen arches/wide feet and at first I was worried this would be too snug but after two months of wearing them a few times a week they have broken in nicely. I have worn them in both rain and snow with dry feet when I take them off. I really love the look of these! I have worn them to work, out with friends and to run errands. All in all it’s a great, sturdy, stylish, all-purpose boot which is what I was wanting. Very pleased, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for walking
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, cute and waterproof. I take my dog walking in the woods every day and you to the perfect boots for that. Other reviewer’s have talked about being able to walk miles and miles and then very comfortably and I would agree with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for some comfy boots that look nice but are comfy, these are the winners. I am so happy with this purchase. I did originally buy a size 8, which is my typical shoe size, but had to go up 0.5 in size to ensure they fit well. The size 8 was just too snug even with a thin sock. I am very satisfied with this shoe, and would totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Koster

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 10. When I got these a size 10 would've worked but since they are waterproof I anticipate wearing them in snow and wanted to wear thick socks so I exchanged for a 10.5 and love them. The first time wearing them out I immediately stepped in a giant patch of mud in both of them... between that and washing them the next morning they are indeed waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are worth the investment on every level!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with these boots! I was worried they would be too narrow-too short with a somewhat heavier sock...not at all! I need a fair amount of arch support-I’ve had no foot issues from wearing them all day. They are waterproof-which I have seen for myself. They are very in style-have gotten many compliments. I got the Tauoe color-perfect! These are worth the investment on every level!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute practical waterproof everyday bootie
customer_reviews.text: I love these little boots. They were a little tight across the instep,as I have a high arch. But they broke in just fine after a few wears w thick socks. Im normally 7.5 or 8. Ordered 8;they fit and as I said I wear a wool sock, for warmth. Other review said they had peeling on the heel, I oiled heel when I got them, and no troubled. Perfect casual waterproof booty for rainy snowy day walking around down town, our in and out of stores and to the car. Very cute too! Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: mc pepper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: I never have high expectations when buying footwear online - I’ve returned at least twice as many pairs as I’ve kept. But these were just what I expected and fit perfectly. They are gorgeous boots, just the right ankle height, and I can’t wait to leave my house and wear them somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: weavelea

customer_reviews.title: Sorel quality- comfortable- and cute
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the fit- but these are so comfortable. My hiking Sorels are a bit tight in the toe box but these are perfect. There is enough support to comfortably wear all day without having achy knees. I am a teacher so I am on my feet all day. These are PERFECT for school, walking around the city, the rainy fall, and literally anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Just order larger size and you’ll be happy
customer_reviews.text: My original purchase of this boot was disappointing because it ran super small. I usually wear an 8.5 and finally got a good fit with a size 10! And that’s not with thick socks, just tights. The quality of the boot is good though. It was my first Chicago winter and these are serving me well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love them ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure how they would look with the height but I love them. I like to wear them with a black/dark pant bc they do break up the line of your leg and I have large calves so I try not to draw attention there but I love these. I’m still breaking them in and tend to max out at 8 hours of wearing them (I’m on my feet all day and work 13 hour shift) but they broke in pretty quickly and the slight heel helps my back out when on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & stylish
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable, waterproof, semi-dressy boot to take to Ireland & I found it! It’s a great looking boot, not to mention the comfort. As soon as I received them (even earlier than expected!) I put them on & didn’t remove them for the rest of the day. I normally wear 9.5-10 so went with the 10 because I plan on wearing a bit heavier sock & glad I did. I’ll repost on my return to see if I’m as excited about them after I put them through the ‘Ireland test’.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My feet were warm and dry.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear during a 2 week trip to Europe in November. I was looking for something waterproof and comfortable. I was a little hesitant that they would hurt my feet. I alternated between tennis shoes and these boots. I was pleasantly surprised that I didn’t get any blisters. And we did a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I’ve been looking for an ankle boot that’s waterproof, stylish, comfy enough to walk in, and comes in a women’s 13. This boot checks all those boxes! The toe box was narrow at first, but these shoes broke in quickly
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great After Breaking In
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous that these boots were too tight and/or would require a shoe horn to get on, but after a couple of wears they broke in and feel like they fit perfectly. I got a size 10 and regularly wear a size 10. The waterproof feature is great and they are light on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: REH

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match the description
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and they fit perfectly. The only thing is they're more of a dark green/brown color rather than the picture light tan, which is what I was expecting and reason for the purchase :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Heel delaminated quite quickly (bad glue?)
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfy and look great for work. Only down side was the heel delaminated very quickly (granted I worked in wet/cold/harsh conditions). For the price I thought they would last longer. I heard a rumor that Sorel has been making their shoes in China and they are now a lower quality. This pair was in fact made in China. I haven’t found anything else I prefer at this point but I am looking for a new, similar boot.
customer_reviews.author: Ca336

customer_reviews.title: Like Butta!  So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this boot. Slips on and is comfortable from the get go to the end of the day. Waterproof. I walk through snow and ice and at the end of the day, you wouldn't know it. They are nice looking, and I'm thinking hard about getting a second pair because I will be sad when I wear these out, which I probably won't. Thank you Sorel for the consistent quality in your products. I can never go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: My everyday work shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a country girl. Easy to put these boots on and take off. Comfortable to walk in all day. Great for walking in on dirt, pine needles, pinecones, uneven surfaces, weeds, mud.... these are my go to shoes for getting the outdoor jobs done and cute enough to go to town with... I have a clean pair for that. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Voss-e

customer_reviews.title: Major/Black
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition! The color was not exactly what I expected but I still like them! On other websites it showed them to be a light tan, and on amazon it showed them to be an olive color. They are a brown with an olive hint when the light hits them. The fit is great. I normally wear between a 6.5 and 7. The 7 was perfect but is a narrower shoe. Traction will be awesome for winter!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota A.

customer_reviews.title: I have several pairs and would recommend to anyone looking for a great boot
customer_reviews.text: I love Sorel boots. If you have a high arch it is a little uncomfortable getting into the boot because of how it is made and being new (there is no zipper to open the boot up). Once you break the boot in, it is a very comfortable boot and fits well. Sorel has been with me through years in Afghanistan and now in Iraq. They are made very well and hold up even walking on rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: True Sorel quality
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought these to replace some Born non waterproof boots. Fit true to size, not the best arch support. This is a pull on style so it takes some working to get her feet in. As time the leather and elastic has given way a bit. Good traction, leather is great quality and the boot is very waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: William Poteet

customer_reviews.title: So nice but not a good fit on my foot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much, they’re exactly what I wanted. Unfortunately, they are too big in the heel and flop, while too tight in the toe. I know the toe would stretch with wear, but can’t deal with a floppy heel, they pulled my socks down off my feet. I do have narrow feet. Too bad, I’m so disappointed! They seem well made and would go with everything. Comfortable, too, if they fit right.
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Stay true to your size
customer_reviews.text: I had a doubt whether to pick the shoe size a little bit larger or stick to my true size. I’m so glad I sticked to my shoe size, although the shoe itself is a little tight at the beginning it doesn't hurt, it just provides reassurance that your feet are safe, dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: For this price I was expecting these shoes to last longer. I've had these for under a month and the elastic is already starting to break down. Very disappointing :( Also the leather takes on a very dusty look quite easily. The shoes were fairly comfortable and my feet stayed warm and dry in them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots even better than I expected but I am really disappointed in the fit. I have a narrow foot but a somewhat high arch and ordered a half size larger than I normally wear based on some of the reviews. It wasn’t enough. They are extremely tight across the top of my foot. Other than that, the souls are comfortable and the quality is great. I will exchange them for a larger size and hope that loosens them up enough to make them bearable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every day boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on a whim, and I'm so happy I did. I'll be coming back for more colors. I'm between an 8.5 and 9. I ordered an 8.5 and they fit like a glove. There's no break-in time. They're like walking on air and look cute. I've worn them in wet weather (totally waterproof) and they wipe off easily (hello mud!). These are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ExpatMe

customer_reviews.title: Anyone out there with size 9 wide have a suggestion
customer_reviews.text: Typically I wear a 9 wide. I ordered a 9. I could barely get my naked foot inside. I returned them and ordered a 9.5. My feet fit. I can even wear socks, but they are really tight on the top of my foot across the seam. They feel a bit loose in the heal and I'm trying to decide if I should try size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: These are cute and comfortable, but I also the Sorel Lolla Chelseas (in ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11.5 in shoes. In Sorels, sometimes I can fit an 11 and sometimes a 12. I fit the 11 in this style. These are cute and comfortable, but I also the Sorel Lolla Chelseas (in size 12) which I found to be cuter and more comfortable, so those are the ones I kept.
customer_reviews.author: whatsnvc

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing boot. They fit exactly as described and they are so unbelievable comfortable. I wore these right out of the box and walked around all day and I didn't have them bother me once. The color is exactly as pictured. They are perfect winter shoes. Definitely for a casual look, but they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Needed an all purpose boot for casual outings was a bit put off by the price but figured if I wasn't happy I could return ... Must say these boots are great looking and comfortable for walking certainly do hope they hold up for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're not into galoshes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted waterproof boots that didn't look like rain boots. They're stylish, but also very comfortable and durable. I don't like packing a lot of shoes when I travel, so I find myself defaulting to these. You can't exactly dress them up, but they're nice enough that you look put together, while comfortable enough to do a lot of walking, especially if it's wet or muddy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots because I was moving to very cold weather in the middle of january and needed a non snow boot option. Wow have these been amazing! Great water proof, a little tight the first day I wore them, but then, the next day, they were molded to my feet, so comfortable. I found them to be pretty warm, but did switch to snow boots when we hit the negatives. I love that they have a wood heal so they can be reheeled in a few years, much better than blundstone with their rubber heel, I picked these over that brand and Im so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Heysay!

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.text: The latest addition to my Sorel collection - I have a few pairs of bulkier Sorel snow boots that I love, but I was looking for something waterproof that didn't scream "I'M WEARING WEATHERPROOF BOOTS." I can wear these casually or to the office and feel like I blend in. They have great traction and are definitely waterproof. Comfortable - I chose my true-to-size size, probably could have gone up .5 size, either would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Toe box fold issue
customer_reviews.text: The issue I've had is with the toe box folding in over time. This has only happened in the left shoe and as I've worn them and flex the shoe it has increased. I've not crushed the shoe and you can tell it is a fold in the toe. I've attempted to push this out but it constantly returns. It's disappointing because they are great boots, with this exception. I'm hoping I will hear from customer service because I believe it's a defect issue.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful boots! They were very comfortable right out of the box. I wanted a versatile boot that could be worn with leggings, jeans, or a slightly dressier look and for an upcoming trip that promises a lot of walking. These fit the bill. I ordered due to all the positive reviews and I was not disappointed. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Like the boot but disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots. They are very comfortable as well. They do seem to run a tad small, if you like to wear thicker socks, I’d recommend ordering a size up. My complaint with these boots is after one month the inside lining is starting to tear away from the boot. Part of the torn lining was hanging out of the back of my boot one day. For a $150 shoe, I really expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!! But get half size up
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but I had to order half a size up. Normally a size 8 but it was really tight, 8.5 is perfect with socks! Excited to take these on our 14 booking trip to NZ. Been wearing non stop for 2 weeks and they barely need to be broken in!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: These are my everything shoe <3
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for about 5 months? I had a friend recommend these to me as I am hard on shoes but love to look put together. I saved up to buy these and they did not disappoint! I wore them to till my back yard one day and after cleaning them up, wore them on a date the next day. They look great, are super comfortable, made well, AND can take a beating. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Lynn Neville

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore to Scotland and Ireland on my honeymoon and wore these everyday and walked everywhere in them. It was not super rainy while we were there so I cannot attest to the waterproof aspect, but all around good boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: They were okay
customer_reviews.text: Although these boots fit well and were comfortable, I ended up sending them back simply because I didn't really need them and couldn't justify the price. Had I really needed them, I'd probably have kept them because they really were nice.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, but narrow fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little boots! However as other reviews stated they are very narrow, even for me having a narrow foot. They were tight to get on the first time and I won’t be wearing thick socks. They are wearing in well and becoming more comfortable by the day after wearing for a week!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boot-hair stylist
customer_reviews.text: My wife is on her feet at least 9 hrs a day. I bought these and she said its a miracle the difference she feels. The comfort and cushion have helped her leg/feet ache go, almost away. Currently looking to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Too tight around the seam.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep these boots so badly, but the seem that goes over the top is just way too tight. If it was tight anywhere else I'd feel better about breaking them in, but the seam won't ever be that flexible. They fit great otherwise and I really loved how they looked and how sturdy they are. So sad I won't be able to enjoy a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I never ever write reviews, but came to say that these boots are great. I've had them for about a month and I've walked around a lot with them, including in the rain and the snow (I wouldn't use them to stand in the snow for a prolonged amount of time, but for city life they work!). They look good with skirts and dresses, too, they look very stylish! I have a wide toe box: these were comfortable right off the bat, but I used a shoe stretcher to break them in quickly and now they are perfect. I often have to wear arch support insoles and I don't have to with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Warm, stylish and very supportive!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect every-day boot. It is warm, waterproof, extremely supportive to my tiny ankles but unbelievably stylish. I've been slightly cuffing my jeans while wearing these boots and I've received so many compliments! I am a true women size 9.0 and thats exactly what I ordered. Fits perfectly with a thin, light ankle sock. I could easily wear a thicker winter sock as well, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: I pined over these for months... so glad I finally bought them!
customer_reviews.text: These boots look so good! And they're very comfortable, providing plenty of support. I have sesamoiditis so proper support is a must - my feet do not hurt after a full day of wearing these to walk, drive a manual transmission, sitting cross-legged, whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Get them. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend for Christmas and she wears them all the time. Can’t them off her feet! She loves the fit and the style goes with everything. Only complaint would be that she says they get dirty easily but nothing a damp towel can’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I do appraisal work so I was looking for something cute/professional yet durable and rugged for when I work outside in all types of weather. Found it! So comfortable, so cute, and waterproof. I wear them most days for both office work and inspection work. I range between 8.5-9 and I got a 9 and they fit great both with thin socks or thick socks. I very highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots! They are so comfy. I always wear a 7.5 and it fits perfect with a thin sock. I'm sure a thicker sock would fit but would stretch out the boot, so I've been wearing them with a thin smartwool sock. I wore them on a trip to Japan where I was walking a TON and now back in Colorado in the snow. Really couldn't be happier with this boot!
customer_reviews.author: kt2615

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally take the time to review products, however, because I love this shoe so much I had to! I wanted a rain boot that didn't look like the typical rubber rain boot. I purchased for my trip to Ireland with the expectation that we would have wet weather... and we did! I walked through puddles, in wet grass and water NEVER penetrate and my foot stayed completely dry. It also has nice traction and held up great when climbing around the Cliffs of Moher. I would buy this boot over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boots! I always loved the Sorel brand of shoes. I want an ankle boot that I could put on quickly that was also waterproof. I also think it's a cute style as well. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Csurf

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved this boots. They are bit on the wide side but since you'd normally wear them with thick socks it's alright. They are very very comfortable, waterproof. I walked on these boots the whole city of Paris and I never felt uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Cadatal

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my boots today and the color was off. It also had a bunch of scuffs on the toe area on both boots. I dont have time to return them to get ones that dont look used. I'll just have to deal with it. I wore it out tonight and its pretty uncomfortable. The arch is too high for my comfort. They're still cute and I'll wear them till they break because of the price. Just wish I was more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Comforatble
customer_reviews.text: Arch support not great so I put in my orthotics and they were comfortable sightseeing on cobblestone roads and hills in Spain on my recent vacation and I stayed dry on a couple of drizzly days.
customer_reviews.author: jaki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable, cute
customer_reviews.text: I have now had these boots for 4 months and I love them. They go with everything and are incredibly comfortable. Perfect for all types of weather - I have worn them in the rain and snow. They scuff a bit easily, but they clean up nicely with a bit of oil and cloth. I would recommend treating the wood with something protective before wearing out in extreme weather conditions. Overall, it would be nice if they were a little cheaper, but still worth it because I think they will last for a long time. Better than spending 50 dollars for a pair of uncomfortable boots from Target that will fall apart in 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Toe box a little tighter than expected but it's an overall nice boot. Comfortable to wear all day. Waterproof. They do get a little scuffed, but they clean up pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus Potter

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 3 months before the heel 'wood' sticker peeled off and the support wore out. Expected more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

product_meta.title: Sorel - Women's Emelie Chelsea Waterproof Ankle Boots
product_meta.description: The SOREL Women's Emelie Chelsea Waterproof Boot is a weather-ready ankle boot designed to keep your feet happy, dry and protected when a downpour strikes. Classic yet contemporary, the Emelie features all-around waterproof construction, a sturdy, rubberized outsole and durable full-grain leather for a look that's sleek, stylish and ready for anything. Made to be your rainy season go-to, the Emelie Chelsea transitions seamlessly from the office to dinner while keeping your feet cushioned and dry.
